summary.span: Fornece tipos que permitem aos aplicativos ler e gravar os componentes de um documento XPS.

span.span: Provides types that allow applications to read and write the components of an XPS document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Além das interfaces e os tipos que representam as principais partes de um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] documento, o namespace fornece controle sobre o processo de empacotamento, incluindo assinaturas digitais e gerenciamento de direitos digitais (DRM) do [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]documentos.In addition to the interfaces and the types that represent the major parts of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document, the namespace provides control over the packaging process, including digital signatures and Digital Rights Management (DRM) of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documents. Para obter mais informações, consulte a especificação de XPS (XML Paper) disponível para download em [ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).For more information, see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
